author: marekm3498
content:
hey <@412614104222531604> I can't edit it, but Nethermind status:
6110,7002 - working on it
2537 - implemented (possible that we will change library though)
7251 - it doesn't require changes on EL side, so it should be N/A for all ELs

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: We have branches for 6110 and 7002, currently switching out the lib for 2537 as well

author: barnabasbusa
content: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/532 would this not require any change from the EL side ?

author: marekm3498
content:
good point, thx, so we have a small spec issue:
https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7251#execution-layer it says that it doesn't require changes on EL side

we can update 7251 or do it in 7002 https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7002#execution-layer

author: rjected
content: we have implemented none so far, but have a tracking issue https://github.com/paradigmxyz/reth/issues/7363

author: barnabasbusa
content: Happy to mark 7251 as N/A for EL, if you include the change in 7002

author: rjected
content: alos yeah, 7251 needs a spec update if it actually does require engine changes

author: ralexstokes
content: for many reasons (including facilitating independent syncing) we want to put all of the 7002 operations into the payload, so it won't change the Engine API in terms of new fields, it should only require updating the payload type
